snippet.title: Sheepo Trailer- Metroidvania game coming out 2020
snippet.description:
Wishlist Sheepo on Steam!:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1281790/SHEEPO/

Sheepo is a quirky pacifist metroidvania, where you explore a strange planet, collect the creatures you find, and then shape-shift into them to explore the deeper reaches of the planets sprawling landscape.


Follow Sheepo On Twitter!
https://twitter.com/SheepoGame
